algorithm_technique: Recursive construction of strobogrammatic numbers by building from the center outwards.
Iterative construction by expanding from smaller strobogrammatic numbers.
problem_summary_simple: Find all strobogrammatic numbers of a given length.
problem_summary_technical: Recursively or iteratively builds strobogrammatic numbers by adding valid pairs of digits around existing strobogrammatic numbers.
key_insights: For even length, start with an empty string and add pairs. For odd length, start with single middle digits (0, 1, 8).
When adding pairs, ensure the leading digit is not '0' for lengths greater than 1.
The recursive approach naturally handles the center-out construction.
The iterative approach builds up solutions for length k from solutions for length k-2.
